title: Alhambra Traditional School / Homepage
description: ATS offers an excellent educational alternative with high achievement test results, traditional values and high parent involvement.
cleaned_text: - About The Alhambra Traditional School The ATS program was founded on the principle that parents and staff should work together as partners to provide an education that encourages students to pursue academic excellence. The back-to-basics curriculum, pace of studies, and specific expectations for academic achievement and behavior require a firm commitment from every parent, student, and teacher. The ATS traditional program develops a solid foundation of fundamental and higher-level thinking skills through a structured curriculum that is consistent within each grade level and sequential throughout the grades. - [Register for the 23/24 School Year!](../../site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=8&ModuleInstanceID=8058&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=12380&PageID=9) Stop by or call 602-484-8816 to register your K-8 student for the 23/24 school year! Schedule a tour or meet the ATS administrators to learn more about the incredible opportunities Alhambra Traditional School offers.
